title: Please add folders or groupings
text: This is a great app and I’ve been using it for as long as I can remember. I’m at a point where I have too many Authenticator numbers I need to scroll through to get to the one I’m looking for. If we could have a way to set up folders or groups so it can just be two levels would be great. That way I can just touch the “work” group folder and get to my work stuff or “gaming” “personal” etc. Two taps is a lot quicker than going to the search bar and typing out the name of the one I want. Thanks.

title: Feel a little comfortable
text: I know that there will not be 100% fix or prevention from a data breach. Nevertheless I feel just a little bit comfortable knowing that Microsoft Authenticator will allow a safe guard some files I didn’t give permission to someone to access.
